/opt/apps/intel/13/composer_xe_2013_sp1.1.106/bin/intel64/icpc  -fPIC   -m64 -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -O3 -DNDEBUG  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/apps/intel/13/composer_xe_2013_sp1.1.106/compiler/lib/intel64 -fno-strict-aliasing -L/opt/apps/intel14/mvapich2/2.0b/lib -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/opt/apps/intel14/mvapich2/2.0b/lib    -shared -Wl,-soname,mpicom.so -o ../../lib/site-packages/mpicom/mpicom.so CMakeFiles/mpicom.dir/src/mpicom.C.o CMakeFiles/mpicom.dir/src/Buffer.C.o  -L/work/01336/carson/VisIt/VisItDave/visit/manta/2540/linux-x86_64_icc/lib /work/01336/carson/VisIt/VisItDave/visit/python/2.7.6/linux-x86_64_icc/lib/libpython2.7.so -lmpichcxx -lmpich -lopa -lmpl -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/work/01336/carson/VisIt/VisItDave/visit/manta/2540/linux-x86_64_icc/lib:/work/01336/carson/VisIt/VisItDave/visit/python/2.7.6/linux-x86_64_icc/lib:
